name: session-workflow
description: Hobbyist-focused software engineering workflows with comprehensive planning, research agents, and code review specialists. 45 commands, 17 agents (research, workflow, review), 5 skills, complexity metrics (LOC) instead of time estimates.

workflows:plan.description: Transform feature descriptions into well-structured plans with parallel research agents

workflows:work.description: Execute work plans with todo tracking in .claude/todos/work/

workflows:plan-review.description: Review plans with 3 parallel reviewer agents (architecture, performance, security)

workflows:deepen-plan.description: Enhance plans with parallel research, skill discovery, and learnings

research.best-practices-researcher: Research industry best practices for implementation approaches
research.git-history-analyzer: Analyze git history for patterns and insights

review.code-simplicity-reviewer: Review code for simplicity and clarity
review.senior-code-reviewer: Comprehensive code review from senior perspective
review.pattern-recognition-specialist: Identify patterns and anti-patterns in code

skills.wide-event-observability: Wide event logging and observability patterns
skills.test-patterns: Patterns for unit testing, integration testing, and coverage
skills.error-analysis: Error analysis, root cause analysis, and fix patterns
